body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. cast Kaalia of the Vast
2. next turn attack with Kaalia of the Vast + 1
3. when promted put Firemane Avenger onto battlefield tapped and attacking
4. Battalion does not trigger What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Batalion reads: WHENEVER this creature and at least two other creatures attack...

well, there are three creatures, and they're attacking, and we're still in the declare attack step. Battalion does not read: whenever this creature and at least two other creatures declared attacker... so I would expect Battalion to trigger in that specific situation.

I was searching a clarification for it, but turned up with nothing substantial. So my guess here is: Battalion is triggering once the conditions are met What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? linux Zorin 8, magarena 1.48.918
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: Battalion: when exactly does it trigger?

comments.body:
"The verb "to attack" means "is declared as an attacker"; these abilities can only trigger from the turn-based action of declaring attackers as the declare attackers step begins, and creatures that are put into play attacking never count." via http://www.mtgsalvation.com/forums/magic-fundamentals/magic-rulings/magic-rulings-archives/536967-battalion-and-brimaz-king-of-oreskos

**Status:** WontFix
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body: That explains it. Thanks. Didn't find it myself...
comments.author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)

comments.body: I've should have looked here. Now I'm convinced entirely... http://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=338444 The creature card is already tapped and attacking as it's put onto the battlefield. Any abilities that trigger when a creature becomes tapped or when a creature attacks won't trigger for that card.
